text: @milfnokids @letsassume they do work in tandem though! i was prescribed wellbutrin and they said if it didn’t help, they’d consider adding low dose vyvanse on top.

honestly I get that ADHD meds help a lot of people but like do pharma companies pay people to tweet like this https://t.co/heuiOWdxHT
